channel.title: Sits on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Sits on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Sits meeting notes, November 2010.
item.description: 2010-11-04 sits Right, the meeting is starting, it’s an open meeting, so we don’t have a specific agenda, but as the day goes on topics for discussion will emerge, and these will be time-boxed for discussion. As the participation list is available on the eventbrite site, I’m not going to capture that here. Some topics from the last meeting signatures on digital objects correct identifiers on digital objects author identifiers lightweight languages toolsets sword, sword2
